hudlist_menu_main_desc: Options for HUDList general behavior and content
hudlist_menu_left_list_options_desc: Options for the left-hand list, displaying various informaton such as timers and equipment
hudlist_menu_right_list_options_desc: Options for the right-hand list, displaying various counters
hudlist_menu_ignore_special_pickups_opti: Allows enabling/disabling showing specific types of pickups
hudlist_menu_buff_list_options_desc: Options for the list displaying player buff/debuffs and other timed effects
hudlist_menu_ignore_buffs_options_desc: Enable/disable specific buffs (assuming show buffs is enabled)
hudlist_menu_ignore_player_actions_optio: Enable/disable specific actions (assuming show player actions is enabled)
hudlist_menu_right_list_y_desc: Position offset from top of the HUD
hudlist_menu_left_list_y_desc: Position offset from top of the HUD
hudlist_menu_buff_list_y_desc: Position offset from bottom of the HUD
hudlist_menu_right_list_scale_desc: Size scale of the right list
hudlist_menu_left_list_scale_desc: Size scale of the left list
hudlist_menu_buff_list_scale_desc: Size scale of the buff list
hudlist_menu_show_timers_desc: Show drill, saw and hacking timers etc
hudlist_menu_show_ammo_bags_desc: Show deployed ammo bags and shelves. Aggregate option merges all sources into one item
hudlist_menu_show_doc_bags_desc: Show deployed doctor bags and cabinets. Aggregate option merges all sources into one item
hudlist_menu_show_body_bags_desc: Show deployed body bag cases. Aggregate option merges all sources into one item
hudlist_menu_show_grenade_crates_desc: Show deployed grenade crates. Aggregate option merges all sources into one item
hudlist_menu_show_sentries_desc: Show deployed and active team and/or player sentries
hudlist_menu_show_ecms_desc: Show active ECM jammers and whether they block pagers
hudlist_menu_show_ecm_retrigger_desc: Show countdown until player-owned ECM feedback can be used again
hudlist_menu_show_minions_desc: Show enemies converted by the team and/or player
hudlist_menu_show_pagers_desc: Show active pagers with time remaining, if they are answered or not, and time remaining
hudlist_menu_show_tape_loop_desc: Show timer for active camera tape-loops
hudlist_menu_show_enemies_desc: Show counter for enemy units on the map. Aggregate option merges all enemy types into one item
hudlist_menu_show_turrets_desc: Show counter for SWAT turrets on the map
hudlist_menu_show_civilians_desc: Show counter for number of untied civilians on the map
hudlist_menu_show_hostages_desc: Show counter for current cop and civilian hostages on the map. Aggregate option merges all types into one item
hudlist_menu_show_minion_count_desc: Show counter for current number of converted enemies on the map
hudlist_menu_show_pager_count_desc: Show counter for number of pagers used. May be inaccurate if joining as drop-in. Auto-disabled when heist goes loud
hudlist_menu_show_camera_count_desc: Show counter for number of active cameras on the map. Does not include drone cameras. Auto-disabled when heist goes loud
hudlist_menu_show_body_count_desc: Show counter for number of dead bodies on the map. Auto-disabled when heist goes loud
hudlist_menu_show_loot_desc: Show counter for number and types of active loot items on the map. May not show loot if not yet flagged as active or spawned. Aggregate option merges all types into one item
hudlist_menu_separate_bagged_loot_desc: Show separate values for bagged and unbagged loot items
hudlist_menu_show_special_pickups_desc: Uncheck to disable display of all special equipment/pickusp on the map (if enabled, individual types can be enabled/disabled in submenu)
hudlist_menu_show_buffs_desc: Uncheck to disable display of all buffs (if enabled, individual buffs can be enabled/disabled below)
hudlist_menu_show_player_actions_desc: Uncheck to disable display of all played actions (if enabled, individual actions can be enabled/disabled below)
hudlist_menu_secret_item_desc: Various special items such as rings on Birth of Sky and bottles on Biker Heist
hudlist_menu_armor_break_invulnerable_de: Shared buff for armorer and anarchist decks. Composite debuff, will show as part of main buff icon even if disabled
Shared buff for armorer and anarchist decks
hudlist_menu_berserker_desc: Also included in melee and weapon damage boost composite buff
hudlist_menu_bloodthirst_basic_desc: Also included in melee damage composite buff
hudlist_menu_chico_injector_debuff_desc: Composite debuff, will show as part of main buff icon even if disabled
hudlist_menu_close_contact_desc: Shared damage reduction buff for infiltrator and sociopath decks. Also included in damage reduction composite buff
hudlist_menu_combat_medic_desc: Also included in damage reduction composite buff
hudlist_menu_crew_chief_desc: Team buff, also included in damage reduction composite buff
hudlist_menu_damage_increase_desc: Composite buff. Combines several damage increase buffs into a single one
hudlist_menu_damage_reduction_desc: Composite buff. Combines several damage reduction buffs into a single one
hudlist_menu_die_hard_desc: Also included in damage reduction composite buff
hudlist_menu_grinder_debuff_desc: Composite debuff, will show as part of main buff icon even if disabled
hudlist_menu_hostage_situation_desc: Also included in damage reduction composite buff
hudlist_menu_hostage_taker_desc: Also included in health regen composite buff
hudlist_menu_melee_damage_increase_desc: Composite buff. Combines several melee damage increase buffs into a single one
hudlist_menu_melee_stack_damage_desc: Also included in melee damage composite buff
hudlist_menu_muscle_regen_desc: Muscle health regen, also included in health regen composite buff
hudlist_menu_overdog_desc: Also included in damage reduction composite buff
hudlist_menu_overkill_desc: Also included in damage boost composite buff
hudlist_menu_pain_killer_desc: Also included in damage reduction composite buff
hudlist_menu_passive_health_regen_desc: Composite buff. Combines several health regeneration buffs into a single one
hudlist_menu_quick_fix_desc: Also included in damage reduction composite buff
hudlist_menu_sicario_dodge_debuff_desc: Composite debuff, will show as part of main buff icon even if disabled
hudlist_menu_smoke_screen_desc: Indicator showing if currently inside a smoke screen
hudlist_menu_sociopath_debuff_desc: Shared cooldown for panic and health/armor restore effect
hudlist_menu_tooth_and_claw_desc: If standard armor regeneration buff is enabled, it will take tooth and claw effect into account
hudlist_menu_underdog_desc: Also included in damage reduction and weapon damage boost composite buff
hudlist_menu_unseen_strike_debuff_desc: Composite debuff, will show as part of main buff icon even if disabled
hudlist_menu_uppers_debuff_desc: Composite debuff, will show as part of main buff icon even if disabled
hudlist_menu_up_you_go_desc: Also included in damage reduction composite buff
